12 namespace smacc
13 {
14 using namespace actionlib;
15 
16 // This class interface shows the basic set of methods that
17 // a SMACC "resource" or "plugin" Action Client has
18 class ISmaccActionClient: public ISmaccComponent
19 {
20 public:
21 
22  ISmaccActionClient();
23 
24  // the destructor. This is called when the object is not
25  // referenced anymore by its owner
26  virtual ~ISmaccActionClient();
27 
28  virtual void init(ros::NodeHandle& nh) override;
29 
30  // return the current state of the actionclient
31  virtual SimpleClientGoalState getState()=0;
32 
33  // checks if there is some feedback message waiting
34  virtual bool hasFeedback() = 0;
35 
36  // gets the ros path of the action
37  inline std::string getNamespace() const
38  {
39  return name_;
40  }
41 
42 protected:
43  virtual void postEvent(SmaccScheduler* scheduler, SmaccScheduler::processor_handle processorHandle)=0;
44 
45  // used internally by the Signal detector
46  virtual void postFeedbackEvent(SmaccScheduler* scheduler, SmaccScheduler::processor_handle processorHandle)=0;
47 
48  // the ros path where the action is located
49  std::string name_;
50 
51  friend class SignalDetector;
52 };
53 }
